TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ResXDataNode extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ResXDataNode Implements ISerializable

summary.span: 表示 XML 资源 (.resx) 文件中的元素。

span.span: Represents an element in an XML resource (.resx) file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类支持资源文件中丰富数据类型的表示形式。The class supports the representation of rich data types within a resource file. 它可以支持资源文件中任何对象的存储, 只要对象支持序列化和类型编辑器。It can support the storage of any object in a resource file, so long as the object supports serialization and type editors. 可以通过调用其重载的类构造函数之一来创建对象。You can create a object by calling one of its overloaded class constructors. 然后, 可以通过调用方法将资源项或元素添加到资源文件中。You can then add the resource item or element to a resource file by calling the method. 若要检索现有的对象, 必须通过实例化对象, 将属性设置为`true`, 并调用方法来枚举 XML 资源文件中的对象。获取枚举器。To retrieve an existing object, you must enumerate the objects in an XML resource file by instantiating a object, setting the property to `true`, and calling the method to get an enumerator. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来获取一个对象, 该对象用于枚举 .resx 文件中的对象。The following example uses the method to obtain an object that is used to enumerate the objects in a .resx file. 该示例包含一个`CreateResourceFile`用于创建所需的 XML 资源文件的例程。The example includes a `CreateResourceFile` routine that creates the necessary XML resource file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXDataNode.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxdatanode.class/cs/resxresourcereader2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXDataNode.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxdatanode.class/vb/resxresourcereader2.vb#1)] 因为属性为`true` , 所以属性的值是一个对象, 而不是资源值。 Because the property is `true`, the value of the property is a object rather than the resource value. 这会使资源项的注释可用于属性。This makes a resource item's comment available from the property.

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分受信任的代码不能使用此类型。

span.span: This type cannot be used by partially trusted code.

summary.span: 获取或设置关于此资源的任意注释。

span.span: Gets or sets an arbitrary comment regarding this resource.
A string that represents the comment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未将注释分配给资源项, 则属性的值为。 If a comment has not been assigned to the resource item, the value of the property is . 通过 `true` 实例化对象, 将属性设置为, 并调用方法来检索, 可以访问现有 XML 资源文件中的数据节点的属性。 用于枚举 XML 资源文件中的项的对象。You access the property of an data node in an existing XML resource file by instantiating a object, setting the property to `true`, and calling the method to retrieve an object that you use to enumerate the items in the XML resource file. 属性返回对象。The property returns the object. ## Examples 请参阅类的示例。See the example for the class.

summary.span: 检索资源在资源文件中的位置。

span.span: Retrieves the position of the resource in the resource file.

returns.span: 以行位置 () 和列位置 形式指定此资源在资源文件中的位置的结构。

span.span: A structure that specifies the location of this resource in the resource file as a line position () and a column position ().

returns.span: 如果此资源不属于资源文件，则此方法返回一个 和 均为 0 的结构。

span.span: If this resource is not part of a resource file, this method returns a structure that has an of 0 and a of 0.

summary.span: 检索由此节点存储的对象。

span.span: Retrieves the object that is stored by this node.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetValue(class System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService typeResolver) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (typeResolver As ITypeResolutionService) As Object

param.name: typeResolver
param.span: 查找类型转换器时要使用的类型解析服务。

span.span: The type resolution service to use when looking for a type converter.

summary.span: 通过使用指定的类型解决方案服务检索由此节点存储的对象。

span.span: Retrieves the object that is stored by this node by using the specified type resolution service.
The object that corresponds to the stored value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存储的值当前存在于内存中, 则直接返回该值。If the stored value currently exists in memory, it is returned directly. 如果它存储在资源文件中, 并且它不是文件引用, 则将通过使用可以从字符串转换为相应对象的指定类型解析服务来查找。If it is stored in the resource file and it is not a file reference, looks for a by using the specified type resolution service that can convert from a string to the appropriate object. 如果资源是文件引用, 则会尝试对其进行反序列化。If the resource is a file reference, tries to de-serialize it.

exception.span: 未能找到对应的类型，或者相应的类型转换器不可用。

span.span: The corresponding type could not be found, or an appropriate type converter is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetValue(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName[] names) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (names As AssemblyName()) As Object

param.name: names
param.span: 要在其中搜索对象类型的程序集列表。

span.span: The list of assemblies to search for the type of the object.

summary.span: 通过搜索指定程序集检索由此节点存储的对象。

span.span: Retrieves the object that is stored by this node by searching the specified assemblies.
The object that corresponds to the stored value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存储的值当前存在于内存中, 则直接返回该值。If the stored value currently exists in memory, it is returned directly. 如果它存储在资源文件中, 并且不是文件引用, 则在名称标识的程序集中查找该对象的相应类型, 然后查找可从字符串转换为相应对象的。If it is stored in the resource file and it is not a file reference, looks in the assemblies identified by names to find the object's corresponding type, and then looks for a that can convert from a string to the appropriate object. 如果资源是文件引用, 则会尝试对其进行反序列化。If the resource is a file reference, tries to deserialize it.

exception.span: 未能找到对应的类型，或者相应的类型转换器不可用。

span.span: The corresponding type could not be found, or an appropriate type converter is not available.
Retrieves the type name for the value.

span.span: An object to populate with data.
The destination for this serialization.

summary.span: 使用序列化目标对象所需的数据填充 对象。

span.span: Populates a object with the data needed to serialize the target object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
